product_name: Cycle Dog Green Hearts Dog Leash
long_description: The Cycle Dog Green Hearts dog leash is made of old bike tubes; the tough and stylish leash leads your furry friend while saving materials from going to the landfill. Flexible and non-absorbent tube material dries quickly and resists fraying. The Cycle Dog Green Hearts dog leash features a handy accessory loop that doubles as a bottle opener.
short_description: The Cycle Dog Green Hearts dog leash is made of old bike tubes; the tough and stylish leash leads your furry friend while saving materials from going to the landfill.
